vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
λύστρα, -ας, ἡ
and (in Act.14:8 16:2, 2Ti, l.with) -ων, τά (cf. Λύδδα),
Lystra, a city of Lycaonia: Act.14:6, 8 14:21 16:1-2, 2Ti.3:11.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef: § Lystra, a city of Lycaonia, in Asia Minor, Acts 14:6, 8, 21; 16:1f.; 2Tim. 3:11*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
路司得 这个專有地名在原文的意思是 "贖回"
一個位於呂高尼曠野東邊的城市
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
路司得 这个专有地名在原文的意思是 "赎回"
一个位于吕高尼旷野东边的城市
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Lít-trơ, « cởi trói »: hành xứ Li-cao-ni, ở giữa khoảng hai thành Ðẹt-bơ và Y-cô-ni.
